title: Quit Playing God
verse_text: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.
insight: Control feels safe, but it’s an illusion.
Trying to play God only exhausts you. Trusting Him frees you.
one_minute_win: Release one decision today by praying: “God, I submit this to You.”
declaration: I trust God’s wisdom over my own control.
related_devotionals: Isaiah 55:8 Devotional - My Thoughts Are Higher
Matthew 11:28 Devotional - Rest for the Weary
